WhatsTask: Transform Your WhatsApp Messages into Tasks

With WhatsTask, you can easily turn your WhatsApp messages into manageable and organized tasks, right from your browser. If you're looking to boost your productivity and keep track of your important conversations, you're in the right place!

Key Features:

- Turn Messages into Tasks: Click on the designated icon that appears next to a received message to convert it into a task. You can view all your tasks in a convenient sidebar.
- Manage Your Tasks: Complete, edit, or delete your tasks with a single click. Keep your task list up-to-date and organized.
- Add Notes: Append personalized notes to your tasks to remember key details or to add further information.
- Ease of Use: WhatsTaskâ€™s user-friendly and straightforward interface makes it effortless to turn your WhatsApp messages into tasks without disrupting your workflow.
Why WhatsTask?

In a world where communication is constant and information is exchanged swiftly, having a tool to help you stay organized is crucial. WhatsTask is designed to seamlessly integrate with WhatsApp Web, making the management of your commitments and tasks simpler than ever.
